message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you an incredible deal on this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I think you won't want to pass up. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not quite comfortable meeting you in the middle at $6500. I'm willing to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. This is a great deal for you, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere. Let me know if this works for you!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $6000?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $6000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, and I'm thinking $7000 is a fair price for this amazing product. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in!
